scripts.preinstall: node -e "const v=process.versions.node.split('.').map(Number); if(v[0]!==18){console.error('This project expects Node 18.x for build. Detected '+process.versions.node); process.exit(1)}"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try{const inst=require('vite/package.json').version; if(!/^5\./.test(inst)){console.error('Installed vite '+inst+' is incompatible. Expected 5.x.'); process.exit(1);} }catch(e){console.error('Vite not installed or unreadable', e); process.exit(1);} "
scripts.build: node -e "const v=require('vite/package.json').version; if(!/^5\./.test(v)){console.error('Build requires vite 5.x, found '+v); process.exit(1)}" && node ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build
scripts.build:auto: node -e "let v='';try{v=require('vite/package.json').version}catch{}; if(!/^5\./.test(v||'')){process.exit(1)}" || npm run fix:deps:vite5 && node ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build
scripts.prepare: node -e "let v='';try{v=require('vite/package.json').version}catch{}; if(!/^5\./.test(v||'')){console.warn('Fixing vite version to 5.4.11 (was '+(v||'none')+')'); process.exitCode=0; }" || npm i -D vite@5.4.11 @vitejs/plugin-react@4.3.4 --no-fund --no-audit --loglevel=warn
